extendedInfo.description: Are you prepared for people or dead trying to eat you? Are you prepared for mass chaos? Are you prepared for a Zombie Apocalypse?Now you are! The Zombie Survival Handbook is the perfect guide for when this Apocalypse breaks out. So get it and be prepared. With plenty of information and helpful tips you will be ready for any situation. It includes:*Outbreak - find out the different possible causes for the zombies.*Armory - All the weapon info you need*Forts - Don't know where to go when it all starts? Find some good places nearby.*Hand to Hand - Defend yourself against zombies bare handed.*Transport - Not sure what vehicle will be best for you? Take a look here.*First Aid - Mend wounds and save lives*Survival Kit (Paid Only) - The gear you need to survive Z-Day*Tip - Read over the tips and keep them in mind. Your best chance is being prepared.*Survive (Paid Only) - Got some downtime? Play a game to keep your mind off things. Well... maybe to just kill more zombies.*Tools - Zombie Assist to inform you about the types of zombies you are up against.           -Kill Counter... you know what that is.          -Flashlight          -Zombie TypesPlenty more content coming in future updates!Do you see yourself as an expert on the subject? Do you want your name well known during the Zombie Apocalypse? Well feel free to send info regarding the subject. It can be tips, weapon stats, vehicle info, the best forts. I'll get the info you send up with your name or alias. Just shoot me an email.Suggestions, comments, questions, or concerns? Feel free to send me an email anytime. If you dislike something in the app or have an idea to make it better feel free to tell me. I will take care of it.If you enjoy the app please toss it a good rating? Help it be spread to everyone so more people are prepared.TAGS: zombie, zombies, dead, living dead, handbook, guide, survival guide, survive, zombie guide, outbreak, apocalypse, live, guns, weapons, forts, tools, resource, walking dead, dead, walkers(c) 2011-2012 Fallacy Studios. All Rights Reserved

reviews.title: Can be more accurate....
reviews.comment: Weapons section filled with  opinions not facts. Somewhat inaccurate information on the firearms and there should be more broad selection of firearms in the categories. But otherwise great, just needs more tweaking. But I could probably make a better database and I\'m 16. But I commend you for the effort.

reviews.title: Good, but
reviews.comment: What if the zombie apocalypse happens and I cant read the survival part? Then I cant survive. Simple. Best zombie survival guide although all of it should be free. Or else I am screwed
reviews.author: Kyle Millar

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time
reviews.comment: This thing is so flawed. All but two of the pictures for the guns are wrong, the makeshift weapons are dumb (a barbed wire baseball bat and the \"skull crusher\", which is a pair of \"UFC gloves\" with chains wrapped around them) waste of time and will probably get you killed when z-poc happens.
reviews.author: Nick Roth

reviews.title: 627 people are going to die
reviews.comment: This app is pretty lame why would you use an AK 47 which is 1 of the most inaccurate assault rifles around? I understand it\'s very durable weapon you can drop it in my mud/sand water and it will still shoot.but your better off with an ar 15.also the Remington 700 isn\'t my first pic for riflesaround I don\'t want to have to worry about my gun firing itself just by touching itespecially which the Remington 700 are notorious for misfiring.. also a smoke bomb that they have in there will release hydrochloric gas
reviews.author: will lord

reviews.comment: Dumb
reviews.author: Michelle Freitus

reviews.title: Very useful and helpful
reviews.comment: I\'ve learned a lot from this.....and it may prove useful if....or should I say \"when\" the zombie apocalypse happens. I\'d be prepared, I\'d know where to go, I\'d know how to craft a weapon, I\'d know what weapons to use or not,and I won\'t make any fatal mistakes knowing how to make the right choices.Although most features are there,I wish the whole thing was free and I\'d be able to view all the content. One more thing:for all those that hate this app,remember:some of these tips and other things are suggestions
reviews.author: Desmond Nunez
